level.heading: RESPONSIBILITY FOR REPAIRS TO PROPERTIES (ยง 19-718)

level.text: Equipment or properties under the control of the Department damaged by school activities shall be repaired or replaced by methods or means acceptable to the officers of the two agencies.
Any organization using buildings, grounds, and equipment shall exercise utmost care of the property and make good any damage arising from the use.
In granting permits, the Director of the Department of Parks and Recreation may require a money guarantee as a protection against property loss or damage.
